title: Cannot Log Into Client
body:
I am currently unable to log into league at this time. I get past the patcher, and into the login screen, but when I put in my credentials, I end up getting stuck on the "Login Status: Logging in" window, before league notifies me that my connection has been lost. I have done the following to attempt to fix the issue, but none of them fixed it.
- Repair
- Fresh Installation
- Turned off All Firewalls
- Closed all other programs
- Followed all instructions on the support page
- Uninstalled all unnecessary programs as well as all programs that could potentially interfere with league
None of this has worked, if I could have a solution, I would be ever so grateful.

Thank you
~ SoulsAnnihaltion
